text: nam tanneyan teratt irakkiyat. atil veliccavum nervaliyumunt. allahuvin atippettujivicca pravacakanmar yahudarkk atanusaricc vidhi natattiyirunnu. punyapurusanmarum panditanmarum atutanne ceytu. karanam, avareyayirunnu vedapustakattinre sanraksanam elpiccirunnat. avaratin saksikalumayirunnu. atinal ninnal janannale petikkarut. enne matram bhayappetuka. enre vacanannal nis'sara vilaykk vilkkarut. ar allahu avatarippicca niyamamanusaricc vidhi natattunnillayea, avar tanneyan avisvasikal
